DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety pharmacokinetics single ascend IV dos GMI-1359 healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Placebo-Controlled Single Dose Study Evaluate Safety Pharmacokinetics GMI-1359 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , single ascend IV dose study conduct one study center United States . Safety assess throughout study serial blood sample urine sample collect safety pharmacokinetic assessment GMI-1359 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy adult male female , 1960 year age ( inclusive ) . 2 . Medically healthy clinically significant screen result . 3 . Females childbearing potential must either sexually inactive ( abstinent ) 3 month prior dose use acceptable birth control method 4 . Females must negative pregnancy test time screen prior dose inclusion study . 5 . Understands study procedure inform consent form , willing able comply protocol . 1 . Subject mentally legally incapacitate . 2 . History illness , opinion PI , might confound result study pose additional risk subject participation study . 3 . Normal clinical laboratory value . 4 . Normal heart rate blood pressure . 5 . Blood donation significant blood loss within 56 day prior dose . 6 . Plasma donation within 7 day prior dose . 7 . Participation another clinical trial within 28 day prior dose .
